final_mermaid_code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'fontSize': '16px'}}}%%
flowchart TB
    subgraph ACME_AG
        subgraph Applicant
            A1([Receipt of application])
        end
        subgraph Human_Resources_Department
            A1 --> B1[Send receipt confirmation]
            B1 --> C1[Invite to job interview]
            C1 --> D1[Prepare employment agreement]
            D1 --> E1[Carry out job interview]
            E1 --> F1{Applicant suitable?}
            F1 -- Yes --> G1[Send employment contract]
            G1 --> H1([Receipt of signed employment contract])
            H1 --> I1([Signed employment contract is present])
            F1 -- No --> J1[Send rejection]
        end
        subgraph Head_of_Human_Resources
            B2[Applicant verified] --> L1{Application status?}
            L1 -- Accept --> C1
            L1 -- Reject --> J1
            J1 --> M1[Rejection sent]
            M1 --> K1([Applicant rejected])
        end
    end
